author: jacopoc
msg: Moved some more bsh/ftl files that were referenced by the order component from the ecommerce to the order component: the order component is at a lower level than the ecommerce one and so cannot use ecommerce's resources.
Part of OFBIZ-220, but the task is not complete: the order component still references the uilabel files of the ecommerce component.
